> 1. giant snake fang - - - found on asps and other giant snakes wich are
> found an all continents an some its realy hard to find a place where snakes
> live ( hint for elves and gnomes "zone with a lake and isle in middle high
> risk 20 lv mob around") nice for starting players price go from 5 gold to 1 pl
>
> 2. crook sting ----- excelent weapon fond on giant wasp magic poison
>
> 3. bixie sting is excelent MAGIC 1 dmg weapon it can be used very very well
> by..... MEDIUM SPOILER

> low lv PETS to get magic attack and hit that elementals and skeletons and
> wisps and some other things

Two things, an word on stats for crook sting, never seen it, killed a
lot of giant wasps.
Second, Magician's pets can't use weapons of any sort. But CAN hit magic
only critters.

Opinion question, is crook sting stronger then the snake fang? (All this
could be pointless if I get Summon Blade, but nice to know)


-Zikkin, seminude magi.
